projects.name: Ruman AI
projects.description: Created innovative education technology solution, addressing sector-wide challenges with deep insight into tech- education dynamics. Revolutionized inclusivity by integrating multiple Indian languages, dismantling barriers for learners and garnering industry recognition.

projects.name: Chat with PDF using Gemini
projects.description: Developed a cutting-edge application that enables seamless interaction with PDF documents, leveraging advanced natural language processing capabilities. Enhanced accessibility and user engagement by integrating AI-powered search and conversational functionalities, recognized for transforming document management and user interaction.

projects.name: Stanford NLP Group Website Clone
projects.description: Designed a responsive and user-friendly interface, closely mimicking the original site's layout and functionality. Demonstrated expertise in front-end development by implementing complex layouts, interactive features, and seamless navigation, providing an authentic user experience akin to the Stanford NLP website.

projects.name: Tinder clone TinDog
projects.description: Created a Tinder-inspired dating app clone for dogs using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, with added front-end interactivity through JavaScript. Emphasis was placed on crafting a sleek and responsive design, ensuring an enjoyable user experience across various devices and screen sizes.

experiences.description: Engaged in web development internship at Suvidha Foundation, actively participating in fundraising campaigns and community-based initiatives, fostering technical skills while contributing to meaningful social causes.

full_output.name: Harpreet Singh
achievements_and_awards: Achieved finalist status nationwide in the Gen AI Hackathon, competing against over 1 lakh teams.
